DOC.brief_summary: This clinical study evaluate efficacy Helicobacter pylorus Eradication therapy Motilitone Functional Dyspepsia
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Efficacy Between Helicobacter Pylori Eradication Therapy Motilitone Functional Dyspepsia
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , randomize , double-blind comparative clinical study evaluate efficacy Helicobacter pylorus Eradication therapy Motilitone Functional Dyspepsia
DOC.criteria: Roman III criteria One condition apply : epigastric pain , epigastric burning , bothersome , postprandial fullness early satiety No organic lesion Helicobacter pylorus infection take prokinetics , H2 antagonists , PPIs , NSAIDs , anticholinergic , antibiotic , antidepressant , anticoagulant within month surgery might affect gastrointestinal motility
